TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɑː l s t eɪ l ɐ æ s k ɚ t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z v ɪ ð h ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t oʊ ɹ s ɪ k s p uː n s ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p i z f aɪ v θ ɪ k s s l æ b s ɔ b b l uː tʃ i z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ k f ɜː r h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɑː b v iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɑː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t ɔː f ɹ ɔ ɡ f ɜː r ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
